item.title: Clustering of vaccine temporal data in timeline
item.description:
Temporal Clustering of Vaccine events

Events in clinical narratives are naturally associated with medical trials, including surgery, vaccination, lab test, medication, medical procedure, and diagnosis. They are interrelated with many temporal relations. The grouping of medical events onto temporal clusters is a key to applications such as longitudinal studies, clinical â€¦
item.dc:creator: Mohcine Madkour
